001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
004
005/**
006 * Utility for obtaining (singleton) instances of initializers.
007 */
008@StaticUtility
009public final class NeuralNetworkInitializers {
010
011    private static final RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer random = new RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer();
012    private static final HeInitializer he = new HeInitializer();
013    private static final XavierInitializer xavier = new XavierInitializer();
014
015    private NeuralNetworkInitializers() {
016    }
017
018    /**
019     * Returns the random weight initializer
020     *
021     * @return the random weight initializer
022     */
023    public static RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer randomWeight() {
024        return random;
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Returns the Xavier initializer
029     *
030     * @return the Xavier initializer
031     */
032    public static XavierInitializer xavier() {
033        return xavier;
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * Returns the He initializer
038     *
039     * @return the He initializer
040     */
041    public static HeInitializer he() {
042        return he;
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Returns a constant initializer
047     *
048     * @param constant the constant used for initialization
049     * @return a constant initializer
050     */
051    public static ConstantInitializer constant(float constant) {
052        return new ConstantInitializer(constant);
053    }
054}
